mapper.select: select course.id, name, course_score, course_time from teach inner join course on course.id=teach.course_id where teacher_no=#{teacherNo}
select * from score inner join user on score.student_no=user.no where teacher_no=#{teacherNo} and course_id=#{courseId}
mapper.update: update score set score.score=#{score} where teacher_no=#{teacherNo} and student_no=#{studentNo} and course_id=#{courseId}
mapper.select: select count(score) as number, round(sum(score)/count(score), 2) as average_score, max(score) as highest_score, round(SUM(IF(score >= 60, 1, 0))/COUNT(*) * 100, 2) as pass_percentage, round(SUM(IF(score >= 90, 1, 0))/COUNT(*) * 100, 2) as great_percentage from score where course_id=#{courseId} and teacher_no=#{teacherNo}
